meta.title: skunkos / rssguard / source / resources / skins / base / blau-green.xml — Bitbucket

div.h2: Connect Bitbucket with other great Atlassian products:

div.p: Effective collaboration starts with teams and projects.
Get a team, get projects, get organized.
Need help cloning? Learn how to clone a repository.
Atlassian SourceTree is a free Git and Mercurial client for Windows.
Atlassian SourceTree is a free Git and Mercurial client for Mac.
Check out this branch on your local machine to begin working on it.
Atlassian SourceTree is a free Git and Mercurial client for Windows.
Atlassian SourceTree is a free Git and Mercurial client for Mac.

a.title: Track everything bugs, tasks, deadlines, code and pull reports to stay informed.
Content Creation, Collaboration & Knowledge Sharing for Teams.
Continuous integration and deployment, release management.
A free Git and Mercurial desktop client for Mac or Windows.
Group chat and IM built for teams.
Bitbucket is developed by Atlassian in Austin, San Francisco, and Sydney.

div.script:
[[^query]]
Begin typing to search for a user [[/query]] [[#query]]
Continue typing to search for a user [[/query]]

[[^searching]]
Found no matching users for [[query]]. [[/searching]] [[#searching]]
Searching for [[query]]. [[/searching]]

script.p: Existing users are granted access to this team immediately. New users will be sent an invitation.

form.label: Embed this source in another page:

form.data-preview-error: We had trouble generating your preview.
form.data-unsaved-changes-error: Your changes will be lost. Are you sure you want to leave?

div.h2:
[[#isCreate]]
Creating [[path]] on branch: [[branch]]
[[/isCreate]] [[^isCreate]]
Editing [[path]] on branch: [[branch]]
[[/isCreate]]

form.data-fork-error: We had trouble creating your fork.
form.data-commit-error: We had trouble committing your changes.
form.data-pull-request-error: We had trouble creating your pull request.
form.data-update-error: We had trouble updating your pull request.
form.data-branch-conflict-error: A branch with that name already exists.

script.form:
[[#isDelete]]
Committing this change will delete [[filename]] from your repository.
[[/isDelete]]
[[^isWriter]]
You don't have write access to this repository.
We'll create a fork for your changes and submit a pull request back to this repository.
[[/isWriter]] [[#isRename]]
New path
[[/isRename]]
Commit message
[[^isPullRequest]] [[#isWriter]]
[[#hasPushAccess]]
Create a pull request for this change [[/hasPushAccess]] [[^hasPushAccess]]
Create a pull request for this change [[/hasPushAccess]]
Branch name
Reviewers
[[/isWriter]] [[/isPullRequest]] Commit

body.script: We had trouble merging your changes. We stored them on the [[branch]] branch, so feel free to view them or create a pull request.
